ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What skills? ... When you move at half speed, it s working. ... Sneak does not equate to invisibility or anything approaching such I fear. If anyone here
ygData.messageBody:
TRAVISL wrote:
>
> Do these skills ever go "up" at all?

What skills?

> Also, has anyone noticed that sometimes the "Sneak" skill just doesn't
> work? You hit Sneak and you continue to walk/run at normal speed? Then it
> becomes available to use it again and you try again etc. Sooner or later it
> "works."

When you move at half speed, it's working.

> I've had aggressive monsters run right past me while I was sneaking, only to
> have them see me on other occasions. Same monsters.

Sneak does not equate to invisibility or anything approaching such I
fear.
If anyone here has had any good experiences with it, I'd love to hear
them, otherwise, as far as I can tell, it's pretty useless.
